attributes.action: No Second Referendum, If Decision Was To Stay A Second One Wouldn't Be Allowed!
attributes.additional_details:
People had months to decide 'in' or 'out' there were no mistakes made, there were two boxes to choose from, it is absolutely ridiculous that a second vote is even being considered
A win is a win whether it be by 1% or 99% what if the next one isn't upto 60% do we just keep having them?!
attributes.background:
The U.K. Spoke, if the decision was to stay a second referendum would not have even been suggested
The decision is made, there has been three referendums in U.K. history, another one is not required 
If there is another it will be assumed to not be correct as this one was awaited for months
